intro: Syntherisma sanguinalis var. multinervis, commonly known as the red-stemmed syntherisma, is a flowering plant characterized by its distinctive red stems and lance-shaped leaves. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants such as buckwheat and sorrel. The leaves are typically arranged alternately along the stem and have a slightly hairy surface.
